title: championship jewel
body: anyone else a bit pissed off that after 4 days the championship jewels are taken out of the shop. like hey you could buy this for ip but no we'll let you get 8/10 jewels then take it away so you regret not spending money to get the icons... ty rito reminds me of the bull**** project crafting they tried out a few months ago.
